mapper.insert:
insert into mpcenter (
tid, mname, maddress, mdj, fwsdj, pname, paddress, quyu, phone, pid ) values (
default, #{mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fwsdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quyu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into mpcenter (
tid, mname, maddress, mdj, fwsdj, pname, paddress, quyu, phone, pid ) values
(
default, #{item.mname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.maddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fwsdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.paddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.quyu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select * from mpcenter where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and mname like '%${ mname }%'
and maddress like '%${ maddress }%'
and mdj like '%${ mdj }%'
and fwsdj like '%${ fwsdj }%'
and pname like '%${ pname }%'
and paddress like '%${ paddress }%'
and quyu like '%${ quyu }%'
and phone like '%${ phone }%'
and pid like '%${ pid }%'

select * from mpcenter where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and mname like '%${ mname }%'
and maddress like '%${ maddress }%'
and mdj like '%${ mdj }%'
and fwsdj like '%${ fwsdj }%'
and pname like '%${ pname }%'
and paddress like '%${ paddress }%'
and quyu like '%${ quyu }%'
and phone like '%${ phone }%'
and pid like '%${ pid }%'

select count(*) from mpcenter where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and mname like '%${ mname }%'
and maddress like '%${ maddress }%'
and mdj like '%${ mdj }%'
and fwsdj like '%${ fwsdj }%'
and pname like '%${ pname }%'
and paddress like '%${ paddress }%'
and quyu like '%${ quyu }%'
and phone like '%${ phone }%'
and pid like '%${ pid }%'
